Package spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.services

Class RoomReservationService

java.lang.Object
spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.services.RoomReservationService
@Service public class RoomReservationService extends Object
Service class for managing room reservations. This class is responsible for managing room reservations, including retrieving, saving, and deleting reservations. It also provides methods to retrieve reservation details associated with a room reservation.
Author:
Team ABCFG
